snippet: Biodiversity can be viewed as earth's greatest library, the author writes -- meaning that every time a species goes extinct, knowledge is lost.
abstract: Biodiversity can be viewed as earth's greatest library, the author writes -- meaning that every time a species goes extinct, knowledge is lost.
lead_paragraph: These 10 days aboard Argo have been a blur. Each has been a whirlwind of cutting-edge technology -- closed-circuit rebreathers, ultrahigh-resolution 3-D cameras and, of course, the fantastic DeepSee submersible.
